description: Umwana ukorora cyangwa ute imbeho agomba gufubikwa kandi agashi-shikarizwa kurya no kunywa kenshi.
title: Umwana ukorora cyangwa ute imbeho agomba gufubikwa kandi agashi-shikarizwa kurya no kunywa kenshi.
content:
Umwana ukorora cyangwa ute imbeho agomba gufubikwa kandi agashi-shikarizwa kurya no kunywa kenshi. Impinja n’abana bato batakaza ubushy-uhe mu buryo bworoshye cyane. Iyo bakorora cyangwa bate imbeho bagombwa gufubikwa
Imiti igomba gukoreshwa iyo yatanzwe n’umuganga. 
Umwana urwaye inkorora kandi yonka bikunze kumugora gukomeza konka. Icyo gihe nyina agomba gukomeza kumugerageza no kumwonsa kenshi kuko amashereka afasha umwana kurwanya indwara.
